mapper.sql: id, seal_code, seal_name, seal_status_code, use_department_code, use_department_name, record_department_code, record_department_name, make_department_code, make_department_name, seal_type_code, materials_code, mimeograph_description, seal_shape_code, seal_size, seal_center_image, seal_specification, seal_make_type_code, seal_record_type_code,record_date,is_record,make_date,is_make,personal_date,is_personal,deliver_date ,is_deliver,logout_date,is_logout,loss_date,is_loss,remark,seal_reason,district_id,agent_id,getter_id,loss_person_id,logout_person_id,is_chipseal,is_pass,reject_reason,reject_remark,verify_type_name
mapper.select: SELECT record_department_code from seal GROUP BY record_department_code
SELECT MAX(seal_code) from seal where record_department_code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into seal (id, seal_code, seal_name, seal_status_code, use_department_code, use_department_name, record_department_code, record_department_name, make_department_code, make_department_name, seal_type_code, materials_code, mimeograph_description, seal_shape_code, seal_size, seal_center_image, seal_specification, seal_make_type_code, seal_record_type_code,record_date,is_record,make_date,is_make,personal_date,is_personal,deliver_date ,is_deliver,logout_date,is_logout,loss_date,is_loss,remark,seal_reason,district_id,agent_id,getter_id,loss_person_id,logout_person_id,is_chipseal ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealStatusCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{useDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recordDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealTypeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{materialsCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mimeographDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealCenterImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealMakeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealRecordTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{recordDate},#{isRecord},#{makeDate},#{isMake}, #{personalDate},#{isPersonal},#{deliverDate},#{isDeliver},#{logoutDate},#{isLogout},#{lossDate},#{isLoss},#{remark},#{sealReason},#{districtId},#{agentId},#{getterId},#{lossPersonId},#{logoutPersonId}, #{isChipseal})
mapper.update: update seal set seal_name = #{sealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_status_code = #{sealStatusCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_department_code = #{useDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_department_name = #{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, record_department_name = #{recordDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, make_department_name = #{makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_type_code = #{sealTypeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, materials_code = #{materialsCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, mimeograph_description = #{mimeographDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_shape_code = #{sealShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_size = #{sealSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_center_image = #{sealCenterImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_specification = #{sealSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_make_type_code = #{sealMakeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_record_type_code = #{sealRecordTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_date = #{recordDate}, is_record = #{isRecord}, make_date = #{makeDate}, is_make = #{isMake}, personal_date = #{personalDate}, is_personal = #{isPersonal}, deliver_date = #{deliverDate}, is_deliver = #{isDeliver}, logout_date = #{logoutDate}, is_logout = #{isLogout}, loss_date = #{lossDate}, is_loss = #{isLoss}, remark = #{remark}, seal_reason = #{sealReason}, district_id = #{districtId}, agent_id = #{agentId}, getter_id = #{getterId}, loss_person_id = #{lossPersonId}, logout_person_id = #{logoutPersonId}, is_chipseal = #{isChipseal}, is_pass = #{isPass}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason}, reject_remark = #{rejectRemark}, verify_type_name = #{verifyTypeName} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR} and seal_code = #{sealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select file_path as filePath from seal_material where seal_code = #{sealCode} and `type` = #{type};

select id as id,`name` as `name`,certificate_type as certificateType,certificate_no as certificateNo,telphone as telphone,agent_photo_id as agentPhotoId, idcard_front_id as idcardFrontId,idcard_reverse_id as idcardReverseId,proxy_id as proxyId,business_type as businessType ,face_compare_record_id as faceCompareRecordId from seal_agent where id=#{agentId}
select * from seal WHERE use_department_code = #{useDepartmentCode} AND seal_type_code = "05" and (is_loss !=TRUE OR is_logout!=TRUE)
select emplyee_name AS employeeName ,employee_id as employeeId ,employee_code as employeeCode FROM seal_operate_record WHERE seal_id = #{id} AND operate_type = "00";
select emplyee_name AS employeeName ,employee_id as employeeId ,employee_code as employeeCode,operate_time as operateTime FROM seal_operate_record WHERE seal_id = #{id} AND operate_type = #{type};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seal_operate_record (id, seal_id, employee_id,emplyee_name,employee_code, operate_type, operate_time) values (#{id}, #{sealId}, #{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{employeeCode}, #{operateType}, #{operateTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT `type`,file_path AS filePath FROM seal_material WHERE seal_code = #{sealCode} and `type` IN
#{type}

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 AND is_make =1 and is_personal =0 and is_deliver = 0 and is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by make_date desc

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 AND is_make =1 and is_deliver = 0 and is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0
AND ((is_personal = 1 and is_chipseal = 1) or (is_personal = 0 and is_chipseal = 0))
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by personal_date desc

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 AND is_make =1 and is_personal =1 and is_deliver = 0 and is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by personal_date desc

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 AND is_deliver =0 and is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by seal_code desc

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 and is_deliver = 0 AND is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0 and is_make = 0 and is_personal= 0
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by record_date desc

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 and is_deliver = 1
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by deliver_date desc
SELECT * from seal_operate_record WHERE seal_id =#{id} AND operate_type="01"

select * from seal_operate_record where seal_id = #{id}
and operate_type = #{operateType}
SELECT * from seal_operate_record WHERE seal_id =#{id} AND operate_type= #{flag}

SELECT * FROM seal
make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode}

SELECT * FROM seal
make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode} and is_make = true
select * from seal where seal_code = (select max(seal_code) from seal)
SELECT seal.make_department_code from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" group by seal.make_department_code
SELECT seal.make_department_code from seal where district_id = #{districtId} group by seal.make_department_code
SELECT seal_type_code AS sealTypeCode ,seal_code AS sealCode from seal where district_id = #{districtId}
SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id = #{districtId} AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id = #{districtId} AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss =true AND is_logout!=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id = #{districtId} AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss!=true AND is_logout=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss!=true AND is_logout!=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss=true AND is_logout!=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
SELECT COUNT(id) from seal WHERE district_id LIKE '${districtId}%'
SELECT COUNT(id) from seal WHERE district_id LIKE '${districtId}%' AND date_format(record_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
SELECT COUNT(id) from seal WHERE district_id LIKE '${districtId}%' AND date_format(record_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') AND is_logout = 1
select make_department_code, count(id) from seal GROUP BY make_department_code desc
select count(seal_code) from seal where MONTH(record_date) = #{month} and district_id LIKE '${districtId}%'

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM seal where make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode} and seal_type_code = #{sealTypeCode} and date_format(record_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM seal where make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode} AND date_format(record_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m')

SELECT id,seal_type_code FROM seal where make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode} AND date_format(record_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY seal_type_code
